code: @Override public void configure(Configuration config) { // nothing to configure based on the configuration here }

@Override public FileSystem create(URI fsUri) throws IOException {     checkNotNull(fsUri, "fsUri").     try {         LOG.info("Trying to load and instantiate MapR File System").         return new MapRFileSystem(fsUri).     } catch (LinkageError e) {         throw new IOException("Could not load MapR file system. " + "Please make sure the Flink runtime classes are part of the classpath or dependencies.", e).     } catch (IOException e) {         throw e.     } catch (Throwable t) {         throw new IOException("Could not instantiate MapR file system.", t).     } }
